author: Abergale Shep
description:
Set in earth’s not too distant future where blighted farms have deteriorated human society and plunged the world into survival mode, Yume Kitasei’s new standalone novel, Saltcrop refuses to be cornered into a genre. Saltcrop follows two sisters Skipper––a skilled sailor, and Carmen, a trained nurse––on an adventure of a lifetime to find Nora, their […]

The post REVIEW: Saltcrop by Yume Kitasei appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Saltcrop by Yume Kitasei
